alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 7:12PM CDT until May 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 612 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 27 miles southwest of Medicine Lake, or 32 miles southeast of Gordon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Indian Hill, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Round Lake and Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 179 and 208. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
